summary: This document is a Know Your Customer (KYC) review for a financial relationship involving Deutsche Bank. It details the account ownership, individual details of account holders, and the compliance checks performed. Notably, it mentions a connection to Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting the scrutiny surrounding the account holders due to their past associations.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield III
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield III is the Relationship Manager overseeing the account associated with the Southern Financial Relationship.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is mentioned as a contact for confirming details regarding the joint account and is identified as the sole provider of her household.

persons.name: Kshitig Golan
persons.context: Kshitig Golan is involved in the AML compliance process and has signed off on the KYC review.

persons.name: Yoonsun Chung
persons.context: Yoonsun Chung is a compliance officer who has also signed off on the KYC review.

persons.name: Andrew F. Gallivan
persons.context: Andrew F. Gallivan is the Regional Office Director who has signed off on the KYC review.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is referenced as a registered sex offender and former employer of one of the account holders, raising concerns during the KYC review.

connections.description: Cynthia Rodriguez used to work for Jeffrey Epstein, which is noted as a significant factor in the KYC review.
Stewart Oldfield III is the Relationship Manager for Cynthia Rodriguez's account.
Both are involved in the compliance process for the KYC review.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Plea Deal
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was sentenced to 18 months for soliciting a minor under a plea deal.

events.title: Account Opening
events.description: The account associated with the Southern Financial Relationship was opened.

locations: Kalif East 71 St, New York, NY
keyFacts: Cynthia Rodriguez is the sole provider for her household and has provided recent paychecks to confirm her income.
The KYC review indicates that one of the account holders used to work for Jeffrey Epstein, who is a registered sex offender.
The account holders have been clients of Deutsche Bank since 2013.
No negative results were found in the compliance checks performed on the account holders.
The account is classified as high risk due to its association with a former employee of Jeffrey Epstein.
